member.summary: Kepler Status Interface

member.name: M:Relativity.Kepler.Status.IKeplerStatusProvider.GetKeplerStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Get the status of a Kepler Service
member.param: The comma-delimited list of field names. Default is an empty string. Use azterisk ('*') for all fields. Otherwise use ApplicationDomain.FIELD_NAME, Environment.FIELD_NAME, Process.FIELD_NAME, etc.
member.returns: A dictionary of string -> dictionary, where the key is the area of status (ApplicationDomain, Environment, Process) and value being a string -> string where the key is the field name and the value is the value of the field.
